title: Unable to create mirror (unsatisfiable variant contraint ... hdf5@1.10.1
body:
If you want to report a build error for some package, or a bug in core please use the following template as a guideline:

-----

I want to create a mirror but it fails with the bellow error!

### Expected Result

A brand new mirror with all archives into it.

### Actual Result
```console
# time spack mirror create
==> No safe (checksummed) versions for package spectrum-mpi
==> Error: An unsatisfiable variant constraint has been detected for spec:

    hdf5@1.10.1%gcc@4.8.5~cxx~debug+fortran~hl+mpi+pic+shared~szip~threadsafe arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 


while trying to concretize the partial spec:

    petsc@develop%gcc@4.8.5+boost clanguage=C ~complex~debug+double+hdf5+hypre~int64+metis+mpi~mumps+shared~suite-sparse+superlu-dist~trilinos arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
        ^hypre@develop~int64~internal-superlu
            ^openblas@0.2.20%gcc@4.8.5 cpu_target= ~ilp64+pic+shared threads=none ~virtual_machine arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
        ^sowing@1.1.23-p1%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
        ^superlu-dist@develop~int64
            ^metis@5:
                ^cmake@3.11.2%gcc@4.8.5~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
                    ^ncurses@6.1%gcc@4.8.5~symlinks~termlib arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
                        ^pkgconf@1.4.2%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
                    ^openssl@1.0.2n%gcc@4.8.5+systemcerts arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
                        ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@4.8.5+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
            ^openmpi@3.1.0%gcc@4.8.5~cuda fabrics= ~java~memchecker~pmi schedulers= ~sqlite3~thread_multiple+vt arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
                ^hwloc@:1.999
                ^numactl
                    ^autoconf
                        ^m4@1.4.6:
                        ^perl
                            ^gdbm
                                ^readline@7.0%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
                    ^automake
                    ^libtool
            ^parmetis


petsc requires hdf5 variant +hl, but spec asked for ~hl

real    0m45.923s
user    0m45.062s
sys     0m3.379s

```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ git clone 
$ . spack/share/spack/setup-env.sh
$ spack mirror create
```

### Information on your system

This includes:

 1. which platform you are using: `CentOS Linux release 7.4.1708 (Core)`, kernel: 3.10.0-693.el7.x86_64, 
 2. any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.): Nothing custom
 3. The commit checked out by git clone was `8f3d717`
